columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the Patient education history data.

columns.name: PAT_HX_KEY
columns.description: The education key for patient education history. The education key is a string of Title^Topic^Point

columns.name: PAT_HX_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education history topic. it is stored in internal format and can be used to link to topic record in education master file.

columns.name: PAT_HX_POINT_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education history point.

columns.name: PAT_HX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Category item that that specifies the status of title, topic, or point in education history.

columns.name: PAT_HX_INS
columns.description: Date/Time stamp for the instance when the title/topic/point was added, resolved, reactivated or deleted.

columns.name: PAT_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user that added, resolved, reactivated or deleted the title/topic/point for the patient education.

columns.name: PAT_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PAT_HX_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Category item specifying the reason for resolving title/topic

columns.name: PAT_HX_EPTCSN
columns.description: The contact serial number for the patient contact to which this patient education record is associated to.

columns.name: HX_POINT_IED_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education history point. It is stored in internal format and can be used to link to point record in the education (IED) master file.

columns.name: HX_MY_POINT_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record associated for a My point in patient education record history. My point is a patient education point created on the fly and does not have an education (IED) record associated with it.

columns.name: HX_MY_POINT_HNO_DA
columns.description: The contact date for the note record associated for a My point in patient education record history. My point is a patient education point created on the fly and does not have an education (IED) record associated with it.

columns.name: PAT_HIST_TITLE_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) where the patient education history title was documented.

columns.name: PAT_HIST_TOPIC_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) where the patient education history topic was documented.

columns.name: PAT_HIST_POINT_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) where the patient education history point was documented.

columns.name: HX_FIRST_DOSE_MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication record associated with a first-dose education point. This is blank for points that are not associated with first-dose education for a medication.
